    • Method Detail

      • needsRemount

        public boolean needsRemount()
        True if we have manually unmounted content (e.g. via unmountAllItems) which means that while we may not have a new RenderTree, the mounted content does not match what the viewport for the LithoView may be.
        Specified by:
        needsRemount in interface MountDelegateTarget

      • attach

        public void attach()
        This is called when the MountItems mounted on this MountState need to be re-bound with the same RenderUnit. This happens when a detach/attach happens on the root Host that owns the MountState.
        Specified by:
        attach in interface MountDelegateTarget

      • detach

        public void detach()
        Unbinds all the MountItems currently mounted on this MountState.
        Specified by:
        detach in interface MountDelegateTarget
